home.title: Biomedical and Data Lab @ Mahidol University
home.description: Biomedical and Data (Bio-Data) lab at Mahidol University runs by Titipat Achakulvisut. Our lab work in an intersection of applied natural language processing, machine learning (ML), data science (DS), and science of science. We aim to build tools to make better science and medical applications using ML and DS.
home.interests: Applied Natural Language Processing | Applied Machine Learning | Data Science | Science of Science
